Class DriveAnglePID

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team4146.robot.DriveAnglePID

    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput

    public class DriveAnglePID
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput
    This class is used for setting the robot's heading angle to a given value using the AHRS GYRO

    8/21/2016
